author: Nick Nairn
method: Heat a griddle pan until hot. Drizzle the oil over the slices of bread and griddle on both sides until golden-brown. Remove from the pan and place onto a serving plate. Crumble the cheese over each slice of bread and drizzle over the honey. Serve garnished with chopped parsley and chives.
ingredients: 3 tbsp olive oil,  3 slices white bread,  85g/3oz Lanark Blue cheese, or other blue cheese,  3 tsp clear honey,  1 tbsp chopped fresh parsley,  1 tbsp chopped fresh chives
